name: AxAI MySQL Streamer
author: Ali Kutlusoy
description: Execute pre‑defined MySQL queries and stream results back to AnythingLLM.

routes.description: Run a pre‑defined query and stream the result as JSON array.

queryKey.description: Key of the query to execute (see queries folder).

parameters.description: Optional key/value pairs that will be bound to the query.

items.description: One row of the result set.
